attributes.action: Cut Essex Council Staff Pensions NOW
attributes.additional_details: Essex council staff do not mind cutting vital services to disabled people with no regard to the consequences of their actions.They dont mind inflicting financial difficulties on the people they are supposed to work for and only care about themselves. LET THEM KNOW WHAT IT FEELS LIKE . Why support the very people who willingly make the cuts they are so against or is it they are only against them WHEN IT AFFECTS THEM?
